All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class acts as the starter for the client.
    ClientPing
    Class for the client to constantly ping the server and store ping duration.
    ClientTest  
    Connection
    This class functions as a client handler for incoming connections by reading and writing from a socket connected to a client using threads.
    DirectMsgAlertBox
    This class makes an AlertBox for the DM-function.
    GameInfo
    This class stores and provides local information of the current game.
    GameNode
    This class starts and displays the window, where the game and the chat interactions take place.
    GameState
    This class transmits moves done by players in a game.
    Launcher
    This class provides the possibility to either start a server or a client of the game.
    Lobby
    This class functions as a game lobby with internal chat and game.
    Lobby.LobbyState  
    LobbyAlertBox
    This class makes an AlertBox for the join-lobby-function.
    Location
    This class stores information on position.
    Move
    This class transmits information on players moves.
    PingTest  
    PlayerEntity
    This class holds information related to graphical representation of a player.
    PlayerInfo
    This class stores and provides local information of a player.
    Progress
    This class stores information on progress for each player on the track.
    Receiver
    Creates an instance of Receiver using a given socket.
    RenderedTile
    This class represents a tile (a positionX-positionY position) on the playing field.
    Sender
    Creates an instance of Sender using a given socket.
    Server
    This class holds the server socket and handles all connections from clients by creating a threaded client handler object called "Connection", also keeps track of all connections in a list.
    ServerPing
    Class for the Server to continuously ping all the connected clients.
    ServerProtocol
    This class mainly contains methods to process input to function as a server protocol by checking incoming messages and triggering responses/commands.
    ServerSideTest  
    ServerStarter
    This class functions as a starter for the server.
    Textures
    This class loads textures necessary to render images onto the tiles.
    Vector
    This class provides vectors, which are a core game component.
